text.description: Sets the text that will be shown on the tag

hasDeleteBtn.description: Will show a delete button that can include a `click` function

color.description: Sets a color based con Bulma's color options

size.description: Sets a size based on Bulma's size options

onTextClick.description: Sends a click signal from clicking the tag label to its parent component when user clicks on the button

onDeleteClick.description: Sends a click signal from clicking its delete button to its parent component when user clicks on the button
